017package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
021import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
022
023import java.util.*;
024
025import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
027
028/**
029 * Allows adding metadata to a single tag that is used by the operation object.
030 *
031 * <p>
032 * The Tag Object allows adding metadata to a single tag that is used by the Operation Object. It is not mandatory 
033 * to have a Tag Object per tag used there, but it can be useful for providing additional information about tags 
034 * such as descriptions and external documentation.
035 *
036 * <h5 class='section'>OpenAPI Specification:</h5>
037 * <p>
038 * The Tag Object is composed of the following fields:
039 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
040 *    <li><c>name</c> (string, REQUIRED) - The name of the tag
041 *    <li><c>description</c> (string) - A short description for the tag (CommonMark syntax may be used)
042 *    <li><c>externalDocs</c> ({@link ExternalDocumentation}) - Additional external documentation for this tag
043 * </ul>
044 *
045 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
046 * <p class='bcode'>
047 *    <jc>// Construct using SwaggerBuilder.</jc>
048 *    Tag <jv>x</jv> = <jsm>tag</jsm>()
049 *       .name(<js>"pet"</js>)
050 *       .description(<js>"Pets operations"</js>)
051 *
052 *    <jc>// Serialize using JsonSerializer.</jc>
053 *    String <jv>json</jv> = Json.<jsm>from</jsm>(<jv>x</jv>);
054 *
055 *    <jc>// Or just use toString() which does the same as above.</jc>
056 *    String <jv>json</jv> = <jv>x</jv>.toString();
057 * </p>
058 * <p class='bcode'>
059 *    <jc>// Output</jc>
060 *    {
061 *       <js>"name"</js>: <js>"pet"</js>,
062 *       <js>"description"</js>: <js>"Pets operations"</js>
063 *    }
064 * </p>
065 *
066 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
067 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.0#tag-object">OpenAPI Specification &gt; Tag Object</a>
068 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/docs/specification/grouping-operations-with-tags/">OpenAPI Grouping Operations with Tags</a>
069 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanOpenApi3">juneau-bean-openapi-v3</a>
070 * </ul>
071 */
072public class Tag extends OpenApiElement {
073
074   private String
075      name,
076      description;
077   private ExternalDocumentation externalDocs;
078
079   /**
080    * Default constructor.
081    */
082   public Tag() {}
083
084   /**
085    * Copy constructor.
086    *
087    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
088    */
089   public Tag(Tag copyFrom) {
090      super(copyFrom);
091
092      this.name = copyFrom.name;
093      this.description = copyFrom.description;
094      this.externalDocs = copyFrom.externalDocs == null ? null : copyFrom.externalDocs.copy();
095   }
096
097   /**
098    * Make a deep copy of this object.
099    *
100    * @return A deep copy of this object.
101    */
102   public Tag copy() {
103      return new Tag(this);
104   }
105
106   /**
107    * Bean property getter:  <property>name</property>.
108    *
109    * <p>
110    * The name of the tag.
111    *
112    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
113    */
114   public String getName() {
115      return name;
116   }
117
118   /**
119    * Bean property setter:  <property>name</property>.
120    *
121    * <p>
122    * The name of the tag.
123    *
124    * @param value
125    *    The new value for this property.
126    *    <br>Property value is required.
127    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
128    * @return This object
129    */
130   public Tag setName(String value) {
131      name = value;
132      return this;
133   }
134
135   /**
136    * Bean property getter:  <property>description</property>.
137    *
138    * <p>
139    * A short description for the tag.
140    *
141    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
142    */
143   public String getDescription() {
144      return description;
145   }
146
147   /**
148    * Bean property setter:  <property>description</property>.
149    *
150    * <p>
151    * A short description for the tag.
152    *
153    * @param value
154    *    The new value for this property.
155    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
156    * @return This object
157    */
158   public Tag setDescription(String value) {
159      description = value;
160      return this;
161   }
162
163   /**
164    * Bean property getter:  <property>externalDocs</property>.
165    *
166    * <p>
167    * Additional external documentation for this tag.
168    *
169    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
170    */
171   public ExternalDocumentation getExternalDocs() {
172      return externalDocs;
173   }
174
175   /**
176    * Bean property setter:  <property>externalDocs</property>.
177    *
178    * <p>
179    * Additional external documentation for this tag.
180    *
181    * @param value
182    *    The new value for this property.
183    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
184    * @return This object
185    */
186   public Tag setExternalDocs(ExternalDocumentation value) {
187      externalDocs = value;
188      return this;
189   }
190
191   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
192   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
193      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
194      return switch (property) {
195         case "name" -> toType(getName(), type);
196         case "description" -> toType(getDescription(), type);
197         case "externalDocs" -> toType(getExternalDocs(), type);
198         default -> super.get(property, type);
199      };
200   }
201
202   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
203   public Tag set(String property, Object value) {
204      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
205      return switch (property) {
206         case "description" -> setDescription(Utils.s(value));
207         case "externalDocs" -> setExternalDocs(toType(value, ExternalDocumentation.class));
208         case "name" -> setName(Utils.s(value));
209         default -> {
210            super.set(property, value);
211            yield this;
212         }
213      };
214   }
215
216   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
217   public Set<String> keySet() {
218      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
219         .addIf(description != null, "description")
220         .addIf(externalDocs != null, "externalDocs")
221         .addIf(name != null, "name")
222         .build();
223      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
224   }
225
226   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
227   public Tag strict() {
228      super.strict();
229      return this;
230   }
231
232   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
233   public Tag strict(Object value) {
234      super.strict(value);
235      return this;
236   }
237
238}
